amendment.description: To require oil and gas lease sales in the outer Continental Shelf.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5387 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 303.

action.text: Amendment SA 5387 proposed by Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 5194. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4184) To require oil and gas lease sales in the outer Continental Shelf.
